description: In this beautiful, warm and welcoming country house, fresh pasta dishes take up much of the space on the menu – and deservedly so: whether you opt for more traditional or creative dishes, the pasta here is excellent. The region’s famous chicory also makes an appearance, alongside a selection of meat and fish dishes. Guestrooms are available for visitors looking to extend their stay.
